ComicInfo.Title: Laser Corral
ComicInfo.Summary:
Prepare yourself to be - OVERTAKEN!
The penultimate issue of Overtaken arrives! Will and Jesse are wounded, trapped and all alone on a strange new world. Their only goal is to find a way home, but an army of bloodthirsty aliens has other ideas for them. As the end draw near, what hope do they have for survival if no hope remains?
Written and created by Frank Mastromauro, featuring artwork by the talented newcomer Marco Lorenzana, OVERTAKEN is going to take your breath away and leave you gasping for more!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Market Cover A | Marco Lorenzana & Wes Hartman | 1 | B | Direct Market Cover B | Marco Lorenzana & Wes Hartman | 2 | C | Direct Market Cover C | Marco Lorenzana & Wes Hartman | 3 | D | Direct Market Cover D | Marco Lorenzana & Wes Hartman | 4 |
